Want to learn more about Astronomy?

Check out the links below for some information about previous public outreach events that I've been involved with in Pasadena or in Toronto. I hope to soon get involved with more in Santa Barbara. If you're not an astronomer, but have any questions about my work or astronomy in general, feel free to send me a message. I'd be happy to chat!
